Table of Contents

Class AppStoredProgram

Namespace
BOOSEapp
Assembly
BOOSEapp.dll

This class is responsible for: Storing and executing compiled BOOSE commands Managing variables (int, real, boolean, etc.) Evaluating expressions at runtime Providing safer execution with runtime error reporting

public class AppStoredProgram : StoredProgram, IList, ICollection, IEnumerable, ICloneable, IStoredProgram

EvaluateExpression(string)

Evaluates an arithmetic or logical expression at runtime. Substitutes variables with their current values Supports arithmetic, comparisons, and boolean logic Throws clear errors if evaluation fails

public override string EvaluateExpression(string expression)
